I have watched all 30 episodes in this torrent, and it was a fantastic collection. I can hardly believe that this TV show was cancelled after only 30 shows. Thank you neonrainbow for this great torrent! (as usual with torrents like these, I seed well after 150%. And I'll continue to seed)
thank you, I loved this show as a child and have been trying to watch it again. :-)

There is something strange about this collection: every episode has some scenes, a few seconds, cut away, resulting in some jump shots and making the dvdrip subtitles unfit. Don't know why. Just think it's regrettable.
